jobsResponse.descriptionPlain:
Wealthsimple is democratizing financial investing to make smart investing easy, accessible, and transparent for everyone. With over $4 Billion in assets under management and 100,000+ clients, we're the market leader in Canada and are fast growing in the US and UK. Our team is working together to build one of the largest and most innovative fin-tech companies in the world. Join us and change the future of finance. Read our Culture Manual to learn more about us and how we work.

 Wealthsimple for Advisors (W4A) is a growing business unit within Wealthsimple with the mission of changing the way Advisors do business. You'll have the opportunity to work in a 'start-up within a start-up' with a passionate and dedicated team. 

 Our Account Management team works across teams throughout the company, learning the intricacies of how we build and foster B2B relationships.
jobsResponse.description:
Wealthsimple is democratizing financial investing to make smart investing easy, accessible, and transparent for everyone. Wealthsimple for Advisors (W4A) is a growing business unit within Wealthsimple with the mission of changing the way Advisors do business. You'll have the opportunity to work in a 'start-up within a start-up' with a passionate and dedicated team.

Our Account Management team works across teams throughout the company, learning the intricacies of how we build and foster B2B relationships.

lists.content:
• Cultivate strong client relationships by phone and in-person
  • Play a major role in helping us change industry perceptions when it comes to Advisors working with technology (or 'Robos'). You will be on the front lines talking to prospective and current stakeholders, getting them excited about our product and portfolios, and helping them with any questions or issues that may arise
  • Work with many aspects of the business (Portfolio Management, Brokerage Ops, Engineering) in cross-functional teams to deliver the best possible client experience
  • Work on “Explore” projects that you will own from the beginning. See a problem or inefficiency? Let's work on a plan and execution strategy to fix it

• Want to make a difference. We are a small team effectively reshaping how people look at the industry. We need people who 'get it' and want to play an integral part in helping us accomplish this mission
  • Possess a passion and energy for finance and investing. You understand the ins and outs of the wealth management industry, and more importantly, know how to explain these concepts simply
  • Thrive in client-facing situations. At Wealthsimple, our client always come first, and we love the thrill of turning a client’s frustration into a great experience
  • Have great analytical and prioritization skills. You know how to balance what needs to be done with what’s possible to do. You understand the scope of an issue and its priority
  • Embrace technology and the role it plays in financial services. Specifically, you have the flexibility to navigate multiple applications simultaneously to deliver unprecedented solutions
  • Want a career that makes getting up each morning a joy! This is not an average role, and you'll have the ability to make a ton of impact

• 2-5 years experience working with advisors directly, inside sales or in start-up business development environment
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills and the ability to prioritize thoughtfully in ambiguous scenarios
  • Proven record of high performance (e.g. awards, top quartile performance)
  • Awesome people skills and a positive attitude. You will be responsible for building meaningful relationships with our advisors

• Existing relationships with advisors in the MFDA, IIROC, Insurance channels
  • Strong interpersonal skills including ability to manage team members
  • Pursuing financial designations ie: CFA, CIM or CFP
